about_the_game:
"A mysterious disease is spreading every night.
Find a cure to the Noctis Fever at all costs.
Those are the King's orders."

An open world strategy game set in a dark medieval fantasy environment. You can buy and place buildings and you must manage your resources to upgrade them. Every night, you are attacked by creatures. Your goal is to survive until your alchemist finds the cure to the Noctis Fever, the mysterious plague that turns people into nightmarish creatures.



Develop strategies to battle the enemies at night and explore and save the towns invaded by creatures during the day. Organise your troops and march with them in combat. Beware the enemy’s generals and uncommon creatures, these one might annihilate your army with their specials moves and strategies if you are not well prepared.



While exploring the world you will encounter specifics locations where you can find lost peasant, gold, stone, or wood. Those resources will be necessary to build and develop your base. You will be able to decide the fate of your peasants by sending them into the army and fortify your position or to gather the wood to build your rampart.



We want to create games that we love. The cure is a love letter to the old strategy games with a new twist. We hope that you will enjoy our first game as much as we loved making it. Be a part of our future and give us your best feedback!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains Intense Violence, Blood and Gore.
